resources.name: Types
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate types

resources.name: Views
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate wp-views

resources.name: CRED
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate cred-frontend-editor

resources.name: Layouts
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate layouts

resources.name: Access
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate types-access

resources.name: Module Manager
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate toolset-module-manager

resources.name: Toolset Starter
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp theme activate toolset-starter

resources.name: SitePress Multilingual CMS
resources.afterwards: sudo -u vagrant -- wp plugin activate sitepress-multilingual-cms
